title: Hotspot won't connect to laptop using 5GHz Band
content:
So I'm tethering to a HP laptop with dual band wireless card. When its connected its only connecting via 2.4GHz even though the setting in the phone are 5GHz. I have tested on my partners Samsung on the same laptop and that connects via 5GHz. 

any help is appreciated
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
